lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Clippers did not just lose Game 4 of their first-round playoff series with the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday at the Moda Center. They lost their point guard, leader and best player, too.

headline.print_headline: Clippers Reeling After Game 4 Loss, Paul Injury
headline.main: Clippers Reeling After Game 4 Loss, Paul Injury
